QuestData.Title: WANTED: Goreclaw the Ravenous
QuestData.Description: Travelers and Steamwheedle personnel working in the field are advised to avoid the Bloodfen Burrow to the west of town.$B$BThe area is overrun with raptors lead by the cruel and cunning Goreclaw the Ravenous, who has already killed at least two Steamwheedle engineers.$B$BDrazzit Dripvalve has authorized a generous reward to be paid to the individual who rids Mudsprocket of this menace.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Goreclaw the Ravenous and report to Drazzit Dripvalve at Mudsprocket.
QuestData.CompletionText: You look pretty satisfied with yourself. Come to claim the bounty on that monstrous raptor?
QuestData.RewardText: Thank goodness someone's finally taken me up on that offer. I was just thinking that I might need to triple the reward to get that stupid raptor killed, and our budget couldn't afford that!
